title: The Specials
description: When three very different high school students are rushed to the school nurse's office with severe headaches, they realize they have something very special in common...Kory can move things with his mind.Â Heather can hear people's thoughts.David can freeze time.How did the powers develop? What caused them? Are they dangerous? Rogue scientist Dr. Walter Strong seems to have all the answers, but the three teenagers are wary when he tries to warn them about Ascentia, a secret organization whose sole purpose is to capture and control them by any means necessary. It is only when members of Ascentia's Specials Recovery Unit attack their homes and abduct their loved ones that Kory, Heather and David are left with no choice but to trust Dr. Strong, and to risk their lives to save the people they care about most.
author: Kel Pollard
